data.title: Today's News: Our Take - Report: Halle Berry and Olivier Martinez Marry in France
data.meta_description: Halle Berry is a newlywed again: The actress tied the knot with Olivier Martinez on Saturday at the Chateau des Conde in Vallery, France, according to People.\nThe magazine reports photographs reveal â€¦
data.text:
Halle Berry is a newlywed again: The actress tied the knot with Olivier Martinez on Saturday at the Chateau des Conde in Vallery, France, according to People.

The magazine reports photographs reveal wedding guests entering a white tent attached to the chateau. An email to Berry's rep was not immediately returned.

Actors who dated their TV family members

Berry, 46, met Martinez, 47, in 2010 while filming Dark Tide. He proposed to Berry in early 2012 and the couple announced in April that they're expecting their first child together this fall. Berry is already mother to Nahla, 5, with ex-boyfriend Gabriel Aubry, with whom Martinez famously brawled last Thanksgiving after Aubry allegedly attacked the Frenchman while dropping off Nahla.

This is Martinez's first marriage and Berry's third. She was previously married to baseball player David Justice and singer Eric Benet.

View original Report: Halle Berry and Olivier Martinez Marry in France at TVGuide.com
